top_reasons.1: Top-ranked universities with a strong focus on innovation and research.
top_reasons.2: Diverse range of universities and programs to choose from.
top_reasons.3: Opportunity to experience American culture and gain valuable global connections.

c_about: Diverse and highly-ranked universities with a focus on innovation and research. Competitive admissions and higher tuition fees compared to some other countries.

top_reasons.1: Excellent reputation for public universities with free tuition for most programs.
top_reasons.2: Strong focus on engineering, science, and humanities programs.
top_reasons.3: Opportunity to learn German and experience a unique European culture.

c_about: Boasts a strong public university system with excellent reputation and free tuition for most programs. Popular for engineering, science, and humanities.

top_reasons.1: Modern and innovative universities with a focus on specific industries.
top_reasons.2: English-medium programs, making it easier for international students.
top_reasons.3: Opportunity to experience a unique and diverse culture in the Middle East.

c_about: Offers a mix of international branch campuses and local universities, catering to specific industries and fostering innovation. Focus on English-medium programs.

top_reasons.1: High-quality education with a focus on research and practical skills.
top_reasons.2: Multicultural and welcoming environment with a relaxed lifestyle.
top_reasons.3: Globally recognized universities with strong programs in various fields.

c_about: Offers a vibrant and multicultural study environment with globally recognized universities. Emphasis on research and practical skills.

top_reasons.1: Affordable tuition fees compared to other developed countries.
top_reasons.2: Diverse and welcoming population with a strong focus on inclusion.
top_reasons.3: Excellent reputation for universities in science, technology, and engineering.

c_about: Provides affordable and high-quality education with a focus on diversity and inclusion. Strong reputation in fields like science, technology, and engineering.

top_reasons.1: World-renowned universities with a rich history and tradition.
top_reasons.2: Wide range of programs in various fields to choose from.
top_reasons.3: Unique cultural experience and opportunity to learn English.

c_about: Houses some of the world's most prestigious universities, offering a wide range of programs and a unique cultural experience. Requires strong academic records.

top_reasons.1: Free tuition for EU/EEA students in public universities.
top_reasons.2: Wide range of programs in various fields, including renowned business schools.
